snippet: The man, said to be a 33-year-old American, was working as a freelancer with a team in Liberia; he is to be flown to the United States for treatment.
abstract: Freelance American cameraman working for NBC News in Liberia contracts Ebola virus, and will be flown to United States for treatment.
lead_paragraph: The man, said to be a 33-year-old American, was working as a freelancer with a team in Liberia; he is to be flown to the United States for treatment.

headline.main: Ebola Strikes NBC News Cameraman in Liberia
